languages.text: "О ереси мутации. Мутанты — беспощадные нелюди, знающие лишь как сеять разруху и погибель. Им чуждо все человеческое — грязная кровь, текущая по их жилам, питает их нечистые помыслы. Есть множество историй о том, как целые колонии, чьи губернаторы предпочитали избегать генетических чисток, становились жертвами кровавых восстаний этих тварей".

"The heresy of mutation. Mutants are vicious beasts who sow only ruin and death. They are devoid of all humanity, and the vile blood that runs through their veins feeds their unclean thoughts and urges. Numerous accounts speak of entire colonies falling prey to bloody uprisings staged by these creatures, all because their governors were too squeamish to order genetic purges."
languages.original_text: "О ереси мутации. Мутанты — беспощадные нелюди, знающие лишь как сеять разруху и погибель. Им чуждо все человеческое — грязная кровь, текущая по их жилам, питает их нечистые помыслы. Есть множество историй о том, как целые колонии, чьи губернаторы предпочитали избегать генетических чисток, становились жертвами кровавых восстаний этих тварей".

traits.locale_text: "The heresy of mutation. Mutants are merciless beasts who only know how to sow ruin. They are devoid of anything human — the vile blood that runs in their veins feeds their unclean thoughts and urges. Numerous accounts describe entire colonies falling prey to bloody uprisings staged by these creatures just because their governors were too squeamish to order genetic purges."

Numerous accounts describe entire colonies falling prey to bloody uprisings staged by these creatures just because their governors were too squeamish to order genetic purges."

Numerous accounts speak of entire colonies falling prey to bloody uprisings staged by these creatures, all because their governors were too squeamish to order genetic purges."

Numerous accounts speak of entire colonies falling prey to bloody uprisings staged by these creatures, all because their governors were too squeamish to order genetic purges."

They are devoid of all humanity, and the vile blood that runs through their veins feeds their unclean thoughts and urges. Numerous accounts speak of entire colonies falling prey to bloody uprisings staged by these creatures, all because their governors were too squeamish to order genetic purges."

"The heresy of mutation. Mutants are vicious beasts who sow only ruin and death. They are devoid of all humanity, and the vile blood that runs through their veins feeds their unclean thoughts and urges. Numerous accounts speak of entire colonies falling prey to bloody uprisings staged by these creatures, all because their governors were too squeamish to order genetic purges."

languages.text: «La herejía de la mutación. Los mutantes son bestias salvajes que solo siembran la ruina y la muerte. Carecen de toda humanidad, y la sangre vil que corre por sus venas alimenta sus pensamientos e impulsos impuros. Hay numerosos informes de colonias enteras arrasadas por las sangrientas revueltas que organizan estas criaturas, y todo porque sus gobernadores eran demasiado aprensivos para ordenar purgas genéticas».
languages.original_text: "The heresy of mutation. Mutants are vicious beasts who sow only ruin and death. They are devoid of all humanity, and the vile blood that runs through their veins feeds their unclean thoughts and urges. Numerous accounts speak of entire colonies falling prey to bloody uprisings staged by these creatures, all because their governors were too squeamish to order genetic purges."

traits.locale_text: «La herejía de la mutación. Los mutantes son bestias salvajes que solo siembran la ruina y la muerte. Carecen de toda humanidad, y la sangre vil que corre por sus venas alimenta sus pensamientos e impulsos impuros. Hay numerosos informes de colonias enteras arrasadas por las sangrientas revueltas que organizan estas criaturas, y todo porque sus gobernadores eran demasiado aprensivos para ordenar purgas genéticas».

languages.text: 「変異の異端です。変異体は破滅と死しかもたらさない凶暴な獣です。彼らには人間性が欠如しており、その血管を流れる不浄な血が汚れた思考と衝動を養います。コロニー全体がこの生物による血なまぐさい反乱の餌食になったという証言は数多くあり、その理由はすべて、統治者が遺伝子の粛清を命じられないほど臆病だったからというものです」
languages.original_text: "The heresy of mutation. Mutants are vicious beasts who sow only ruin and death. They are devoid of all humanity, and the vile blood that runs through their veins feeds their unclean thoughts and urges. Numerous accounts speak of entire colonies falling prey to bloody uprisings staged by these creatures, all because their governors were too squeamish to order genetic purges."

traits.locale_text: 「変異の異端です。変異体は破滅と死しかもたらさない凶暴な獣です。彼らには人間性が欠如しており、その血管を流れる不浄な血が汚れた思考と衝動を養います。コロニー全体がこの生物による血なまぐさい反乱の餌食になったという証言は数多くあり、その理由はすべて、統治者が遺伝子の粛清を命じられないほど臆病だったからというものです」

languages.text: “他们是变异的怪物，是异端分子。变种人是邪恶的牲畜，只会散布毁灭与死亡。他们没有一丝人性，他们血管里流淌着邪恶的血液，滋养着不洁的思想和欲望。我看过很多报告，许多殖民地的变种怪物引发了暴乱，而那些殖民地最终也沦为血腥暴乱的牺牲品。这一切都是因为当地的统治者过于孱弱，不愿下令进行基因清洗。”
languages.original_text: "The heresy of mutation. Mutants are vicious beasts who sow only ruin and death. They are devoid of all humanity, and the vile blood that runs through their veins feeds their unclean thoughts and urges. Numerous accounts speak of entire colonies falling prey to bloody uprisings staged by these creatures, all because their governors were too squeamish to order genetic purges."

traits.locale_text: “他们是变异的怪物，是异端分子。变种人是邪恶的牲畜，只会散布毁灭与死亡。他们没有一丝人性，他们血管里流淌着邪恶的血液，滋养着不洁的思想和欲望。我看过很多报告，许多殖民地的变种怪物引发了暴乱，而那些殖民地最终也沦为血腥暴乱的牺牲品。这一切都是因为当地的统治者过于孱弱，不愿下令进行基因清洗。”

languages.text: "Die Ketzerei der Mutation. Mutanten sind wilde Bestien, die nur Zerstörung und Tod bringen. Sie haben keine Menschlichkeit, und das widerliche Blut in ihren Adern nährt ihre unreinen Gedanken und Triebe. Zahlreiche Berichte künden von ganzen Kolonien, die blutigen Aufständen durch diese Kreaturen zum Opfer gefallen sind, nur weil ihre Gouverneure zu zimperlich waren, genetische Säuberungen anzuordnen."
languages.original_text: "The heresy of mutation. Mutants are vicious beasts who sow only ruin and death. They are devoid of all humanity, and the vile blood that runs through their veins feeds their unclean thoughts and urges. Numerous accounts speak of entire colonies falling prey to bloody uprisings staged by these creatures, all because their governors were too squeamish to order genetic purges."

traits.locale_text: "Die Ketzerei der Mutation. Mutanten sind wilde Bestien, die nur Zerstörung und Tod bringen. Sie haben keine Menschlichkeit, und das widerliche Blut in ihren Adern nährt ihre unreinen Gedanken und Triebe. Zahlreiche Berichte künden von ganzen Kolonien, die blutigen Aufständen durch diese Kreaturen zum Opfer gefallen sind, nur weil ihre Gouverneure zu zimperlich waren, genetische Säuberungen anzuordnen."

languages.text: « L'hérésie de mutation. Les mutants sont des créatures vicieuses dénuées de la moindre trace d'humanité, qui ne cherchent qu'à répandre la mort et le chaos. Le sang qui coule dans leurs veines nourrit leurs pensées et pulsions impures. De nombreux récits font état de colonies entières en proie à des soulèvements sanglants orchestrés par ces monstres, parce que leurs gouverneurs n'avaient pas eu le courage d'ordonner des purges génétiques. »
languages.original_text: "The heresy of mutation. Mutants are vicious beasts who sow only ruin and death. They are devoid of all humanity, and the vile blood that runs through their veins feeds their unclean thoughts and urges. Numerous accounts speak of entire colonies falling prey to bloody uprisings staged by these creatures, all because their governors were too squeamish to order genetic purges."
